modName: Enb lens flare and god rays only
summary:
This is a simple enb preset that only has god rays and lens flares
This enb uses the v0.213 binary and will constantly be updated.
The better fps version uses the v0.119 binary
descriptionHtml:
I am not going to update this mod anymore because i have too much work for school.



English is not my native language, so excuse me for making any grammar mistakes :P

v0.119 has better frames FOR ME, maybe not for you, try it out youreself.

80% credit goes to --JawZ-- for guiding me how to make this preset.
20% goes to myself for tweaking and uploading this enb.
Go take a look at --JawZ-- his guide, it is pretty usefull:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39742//?

---For the v0.213 version---

To install, first get the enb v0.213 binary here:
http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0213.htm
And copy just the d3d9.dll from the wrapper folder to the skyrim directory, then place my files in the skyrim directory.

---For the v0.119 version---
To install, first get the enb v0.119 binary here:
http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm
And copy just the d3d9.dll from the wrapper folder to the skyrim directory, then place my files in the skyrim directory.

The only problem i see is the adaptation: it is not fully corrected yet, but i am trying to get the best out of it.

You can use the fx.ini files to edit fx files ingame.

You may use this enb for you\'re files, but you will have to credit me and --JawZ--

Thank you for downloading the preset, if you have any questions, feel free to ask the in the comments.
author: muro808 and --JawZ--

files.changelogHtml:
Added bloom.fx.ini, enbeffect.fx.ini and weatherlist.in for ingame shader editing.
Increased overall sun rays.
Increased overall lens flare.
